wikipedia_page.main: Christopher Wight (born 3 July 1959 in the Cayman Islands) is a former cricketer from the Cayman Islands. A wicket-keeper, he played for the Cayman Islands national cricket team from 2000 to 2004.

response: * Christopher Wight (born 1959), cricketer from the Cayman Islands
